# configuration

**Instance Property**

The configuration of the provider.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var configuration: CXProviderConfiguration { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property returns a copy of the provider configuration. To change the configuration of the provider, you must set this property to a  new [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXProviderConfiguration] object.
title: configuration
